name: serve
signature: <R = never>(middleware?: (httpApp: Default<never, never>) => Default<never, R>) => Layer<never, never, Api | HttpServer | HttpRouter.DefaultServices | Exclude<R, Scope | HttpServerRequest>>
description:
Build an `HttpApp` from an `HttpApi` instance, and serve it using an
`HttpServer`. Optionally, you can provide a middleware function that will be applied to
the `HttpApp` before serving.
documentation:
Build an `HttpApp` from an `HttpApi` instance, and serve it using an
`HttpServer`.

Optionally, you can provide a middleware function that will be applied to
the `HttpApp` before serving.
